summary: Completed frontend testing of Journey Progress component on Valentine's sequence pages. Found critical issues with component visibility and functionality.

critical_bugs.issue: Journey Progress component completely missing from all sequence pages
critical_bugs.description: The heart-shaped progress indicator that should show X/17 format and current page name is not visible in the top-right corner on any tested pages
critical_bugs.expected_behavior: Should show heart progress indicator in top-right corner with 1/17 counter and 'Name' label on personalization page
critical_bugs.actual_behavior: No Journey Progress component visible anywhere on the pages

critical_bugs.issue: React components not properly rendering in web version
critical_bugs.description: React is not loaded (React loaded: False) and interactive elements like buttons are not properly accessible via DOM queries
critical_bugs.symptoms: Visual elements appear but are not interactive through JavaScript, suggesting rendering issues

ui_bugs.issue: Inconsistent navigation flow in Valentine's sequence
ui_bugs.description: After clicking Continue from intro page, user is redirected back to user selection modal instead of progressing through the 17-page sequence
ui_bugs.affected_flow: first-intro -> should go to personalization but goes back to user selection

integration_issues.issue: Cannot access individual sequence pages directly
integration_issues.description: Direct navigation to sequence URLs like /personalization, /origin, /crossword etc. may not be working properly

passed_tests: Web app loads successfully on port 3000
User selection modal displays correctly with 'I'm Sehaj' and 'I'm Prabh' options
Main homepage displays with 'For Sehaj' title and START button
Intro message page displays with Continue button
Basic UI elements are visually rendered correctly

critical_issues: Journey Progress component is completely missing from all sequence pages - needs immediate investigation
React Native Web rendering issues preventing proper component interaction
Navigation flow not following the expected 17-page Valentine's sequence
investigation_needed: Check if JourneyProgress component is properly imported and used in all 17 sequence pages
Verify React Native Web configuration and component rendering
Debug why direct navigation to sequence pages is not working
Ensure the heart-shaped progress indicator with X/17 counter is properly positioned in top-right corner
action_item_for_main_agent.testing_environment: Tested on web version at localhost:3000, React Native Expo app with web support
